level.heading: Statute of limitations.
level.text: An action for misappropriation must be brought within 3 years after the misappropriation is discovered or, by the exercise of reasonable diligence, should have been discovered. For the purposes of this section, a continuing misappropriation constitutes a single claim.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-216, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 36-401.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 6 of the Uniform Trade Secrets Act. See 14 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
